tool_description:
Emotion Analysis (multilanguage) from Text

Sentipop advanced AI-empowered Text emotion analysis.
Primary emotions and sentiment extraction from any paragraph of text.
Analyze ,understand and sort comments,reviews ecc. base on emotions contained in text.
You can find the supported langueges in the About section.

This API enables you to detect the 8 primary emotions of a paragraph of text.\
In total, our API can identify 8 primary emotions. 
Those are: Anger, Anticipation, Disgust, Fear, Joy,...
name: Sentipop
title: Sentipop

api_list.name: entry
api_list.url: https://sentipop.p.rapidapi.com/just try to responde. The day is just fine.  &&&4
api_list.description: Detect emotions and respective intensities in any paragraph of text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: just try to responde. The day is just fine.  &&&4

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sentipop.p.rapidapi.com/just try to responde. The day is just fine.  &&&4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentipop.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sentipop.p.rapidapi.com/{text}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sentipop.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
